pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetics Input/Output Functions // Implements readers and writers for file formats associated with genetics data. Reading and writing plink BED/BIM/FAM formats is fully supported, including a lightning-fast BED reader and writer implementations. Other functions are 'readr' wrappers that are more constrained, user- friendly, and efficient for these particular applications; handles plink and eigenstrat tables (FAM, BIM, IND, and SNP files). There are also "make" functions for FAM and BIM tables with default values to go with simulated genotype data.
